test.name: TCPROF Accessing Budinet Page
TCPROF02 Navigate to Accessory Enquires page
TCPROF03 Search for Accessory Profile by entering an existing Accessory Number without Serial Number
TCPROF04 Search for Accessory Profile by entering a non-existing Accessory Number and Serial Number
TCPROF05 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile
TCPROF06 Search for Accessory Profile by entering an existing Serial Number without Accessory Number
TCPROF07 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Effective From
TCPROF8 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Serial No
TCPROF09 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Description
TCPROF10 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Accessory Type
TCPROF11 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Purchased by Region
TCPROF12 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Date Purchase
TCPROF13 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Purchase Cost
TCPROF14 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Located At Branch
TCPROF15 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing Date Scrapped
TCPROF16 Enter Loading details for Accessory Profile without capturing SubHire Company
TCPROF17 Ensuring that a user is able to display Accessory Barcode after clicking Print Barcode button
TCPROF18 Ensuring that a user is able to clear populated fields after clicking Reset button
TCPROF19 Ensuring that a user is able to display User details after clicking View button under the Load tab
TCPROF20 Ensuring that a user is able to modify user details after clicking Modify button under the Load tab
TCPROF21 Ensuring that a user is able to enter new details after clicking New button under the Load tab
TCPROF22 Ensuring that a user is able to enter new details and Accessory Status becomes Termed
TCPROF23 Ensuring that a user is able to display User details after clicking View button under the History tab
TCPROF24 Ensuring that a user is able to modify user details after clicking Modify button under the History tab
TCPROF25 Ensuring that a user is able to enter new details after clicking New button under the History tab
TCPROF26 Ensuring that a user is able to accessory movement history under the Movement tab
